data: The organization Green Horizons Foundation is a nonprofit dedicated to reforestation and sustainable agriculture projects around the globe.
The organization Green Horizons Foundation operates primarily in the Environmental Services industry and secondarily as a nonprofit organization.
The organization Green Horizons Foundation is based in Portland, Oregon, USA.
The organization Green Horizons Foundation works on global environmental projects, having planted over five million trees across five continents.
The organization Green Horizons Foundation has a mission to restore degraded lands and empower local communities through training and resources.
The organization Green Horizons Foundation upholds values of sustainability, community, transparency, and innovation.
